content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":14341,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら、えーと、かなみさん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, um, Kanami-san."},{"lineNumber":14342,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ふふ、幽霊、怖い？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hehe, are you scared of ghosts?\""},{"lineNumber":14343,"originalJapaneseLine":"「べっ、別にそんな事無いですよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-No, not really."},{"lineNumber":14344,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちょっとギョッとしたりギクッとしたり、","translatedEnglishLine":"I just had a little startle and a shiver,"},{"lineNumber":14345,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そういう日常的な反応をしただけですから」","translatedEnglishLine":"it's just a normal everyday reaction.\""},{"lineNumber":14346,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふ〜〜〜ん？　ふふ〜〜〜〜ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmmm? Hehehe?\""},{"lineNumber":14347,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃあ私はこれで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, I'll be going now...\""},{"lineNumber":14348,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょっ、なんで付いてくるんですか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, why are you following me!\""},{"lineNumber":14349,"originalJapaneseLine":"「別に〜〜〜、ふふふ〜〜〜〜。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No reason~~, hehehe~~."},{"lineNumber":14350,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うら〜〜〜めしや〜〜〜〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"Boo~~oo, spooky~~!\""},{"lineNumber":14351,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああっ、もう怖くはないけどめんどくさい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, I’m not scared anymore but this is annoying!\""},{"lineNumber":14352,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………エンジョイしとるな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...You’re really enjoying this, huh...\""},{"lineNumber":14353,"originalJapaneseLine":"パセリは楽しそうだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Paseri looked like she was having fun."},{"lineNumber":14354,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ううむ……どうしたものか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmm... What should I do?\""},{"lineNumber":14355,"originalJapaneseLine":"城の中を、悩んだ様子のパステルが","translatedEnglishLine":"Pastel, looking troubled,"},{"lineNumber":14356,"originalJapaneseLine":"うろうろと徘徊していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"was wandering restlessly inside the castle."},{"lineNumber":14357,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？　なんだパステル。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm? What's the matter, Pastel?"},{"lineNumber":14358,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うろうろと徘徊して」","translatedEnglishLine":"Wandering around like that.\""},{"lineNumber":14359,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おぬしか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You are..."},{"lineNumber":14360,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お母様から、念話が来ての」","translatedEnglishLine":"Received a telepathic message from mother.\""},{"lineNumber":14361,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は？　モダンちゃんが？　どうしたって？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Modan-chan? What happened?\""},{"lineNumber":14362,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ……すぐに切れたが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes... it ended quickly, but"},{"lineNumber":14363,"originalJapaneseLine":"　混乱されているようで……よく分からぬ」","translatedEnglishLine":"she seemed confused... I don’t really understand.\""},{"lineNumber":14364,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むむ。何かトラブルか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm. Is there some kind of trouble?"},{"lineNumber":14365,"originalJapaneseLine":"　変な奴にさらわれたとか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Like she was kidnapped by some strange person or something?\""},{"lineNumber":14366,"originalJapaneseLine":"「英霊じゃぞ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A heroic spirit, you know...\""},{"lineNumber":14367,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、モダンちゃんだぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But it’s Modan-chan."},{"lineNumber":14368,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何かの拍子に、ふらふらと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe she just wandered off absentmindedly...\""},{"lineNumber":14369,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………確かめるがよいか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Shall we go check?\""},{"lineNumber":14370,"originalJapaneseLine":"「割り当てた部屋はこっちか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is this the assigned room?"},{"lineNumber":14371,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ま、行ってみるか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, let’s go see.\""},{"lineNumber":14372,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん、婿殿」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, son-in-law.\""},{"lineNumber":14373,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、パステル……ランスさんも」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Pastel... and Rance-san too.\""},{"lineNumber":14374,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お母様……にお婆様。一体何事が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mother... and Great-Grandmother. What on earth is happening...?\""},{"lineNumber":14375,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ごめんね、危ない事とかじゃなかったんだけど。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sorry, it's nothing dangerous or anything."},{"lineNumber":14376,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well... um...\""},{"lineNumber":14377,"originalJapaneseLine":"モダンの指先が、","translatedEnglishLine":"Modan’s fingertips"},{"lineNumber":14378,"originalJapaneseLine":"光の射す窓際のテーブルへと向けられた。","translatedEnglishLine":"were directed to the table by the window where the light shone."},{"lineNumber":14379,"originalJapaneseLine":"「パセリと…………フル……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Paseri and... Furu...?\""},{"lineNumber":14380,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人は何故か和やかに、テーブルに着いていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"For some reason, the two were sitting peacefully at the table."},{"lineNumber":14381,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………どういうことだ……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What does this mean...?\""},{"lineNumber":14382,"originalJapaneseLine":"「有り体に入って、私にもさっぱり分からん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"To be honest, I have no idea either.\""},{"lineNumber":14383,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの、曾お婆様が……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, Great-Great-Grandmother... ?\""},{"lineNumber":14384,"originalJapaneseLine":"「このカラーは、パセリの友達だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This Carla is a friend of Paseri."},{"lineNumber":14385,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まぐ、むく、んく」","translatedEnglishLine":"Magu, muk, nku.\""},{"lineNumber":14386,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、菓子のガキ。……友達だと？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, a sweet little brat. ...A friend?\""},{"lineNumber":14387,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは我に捧げられたマフィンだぞ、貴様」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That muffin was offered to me, you know, you.\""},{"lineNumber":14388,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その身体では食べられまい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"With that body, you couldn’t eat it."},{"lineNumber":14389,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なので儂が消費してやっただけのこと」","translatedEnglishLine":"So I just consumed it myself.\""},{"lineNumber":14390,"originalJapaneseLine":"「精神性の問題だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It’s a matter of spirit."},{"lineNumber":14391,"originalJapaneseLine":"　我の許可無く掠め取るならば","translatedEnglishLine":"If you steal without my permission,"},{"lineNumber":14392,"originalJapaneseLine":"　にゃんにゃんだろうと許しはせぬ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I won’t forgive you—even if it’s Nyan Nyan.\""},{"lineNumber":14393,"originalJapaneseLine":"「覆水盆に返らず。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Spilled water will not return to the tray."},{"lineNumber":14394,"originalJapaneseLine":"　せめて欠落した味覚だけでも伝えてやろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"At least I’ll pass on the missing taste."},{"lineNumber":14395,"originalJapaneseLine":"　めっちゃ美味しい」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s incredibly delicious.\""},{"lineNumber":14396,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………愉快な生き物だな、貴様は……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...You are quite an amusing creature...!\""},{"lineNumber":14397,"originalJapaneseLine":"言葉通り愉快そうに唇を歪めながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"Distorting his lips in an expression of amusement,"},{"lineNumber":14398,"originalJapaneseLine":"フルは手に魔力を集中していく。","translatedEnglishLine":"Furu concentrated magic power into his hand."},{"lineNumber":14399,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいはい。すぐもうひとつ焼くから。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, alright. I’ll bake another one right away."},{"lineNumber":14400,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ルーシーにもね」","translatedEnglishLine":"For Lucy too.\""}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehe, are you scared of ghosts?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「べっ、別にそんな事無いですよ。
ちょっとギョッとしたりギクッとしたり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just had a little startle and a shiver,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう日常的な反応をしただけですから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's just a normal everyday reaction."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょっ、なんで付いてくるんですか！」
「ああっ、もう怖くはないけどめんどくさい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, I’m not scared anymore but this is annoying!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パセリは楽しそうだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Paseri looked like she was having fun.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城の中を、悩んだ様子のパステルが
うろうろと徘徊していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was wandering restlessly inside the castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お母様から、念話が来ての」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Received a telepathic message from mother."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は？　モダンちゃんが？　どうしたって？」
混乱されているようで……よく分からぬ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she seemed confused... I don’t really understand."
"Hmm. Is there some kind of trouble?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 変な奴にさらわれたとか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like she was kidnapped by some strange person or something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何かの拍子に、ふらふらと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe she just wandered off absentmindedly..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「割り当てた部屋はこっちか。
「お母様……にお婆様。一体何事が……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mother... and Great-Grandmother. What on earth is happening...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ごめんね、危ない事とかじゃなかったんだけど。
光の射す窓際のテーブルへと向けられた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were directed to the table by the window where the light shone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人は何故か和やかに、テーブルに着いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, the two were sitting peacefully at the table.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「有り体に入って、私にもさっぱり分からん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To be honest, I have no idea either."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このカラーは、パセリの友達だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This Carla is a friend of Paseri.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは我に捧げられたマフィンだぞ、貴様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That muffin was offered to me, you know, you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その身体では食べられまい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "With that body, you couldn’t eat it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なので儂が消費してやっただけのこと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So I just consumed it myself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我の許可無く掠め取るならば
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you steal without my permission,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: にゃんにゃんだろうと許しはせぬ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won’t forgive you—even if it’s Nyan Nyan."
"Spilled water will not return to the tray.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せめて欠落した味覚だけでも伝えてやろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At least I’ll pass on the missing taste.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言葉通り愉快そうに唇を歪めながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Distorting his lips in an expression of amusement,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フルは手に魔力を集中していく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Furu concentrated magic power into his hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はいはい。すぐもうひとつ焼くから。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, alright. I’ll bake another one right away.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

ちょっとギョッとしたりギクッとしたり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just had a little startle and a shiver,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At least I’ll pass on the missing taste.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Distorting his lips in an expression of amusement,
